title: Which diets are best for the planet?
lede: Ultimately, the best diet for the planet is fueled by the collective. Small changes you make can be multiplied by the masses.

title: Why do we need to increase food production by 50%?
lede: Population growth combined with shifting trends towards resource-intensive diets will put massive pressure on our planet's ability to feed us in the decades to come.

title: What strategies can help close the food gap?
lede: A truly sustainable future needs both smarter yields and smarter consumption.

title: Which countries have the greatest potential for change?
lede: Not all nations eat equally. Data reveals a wide disparity in diet-related resource use, indicating that some countries can change more than others.
